name: Freedom & Equality
description:
FREEDOM & EQUALITY 

"After all, maybe freedom is not only to do what I want when I want it?" 

Game developed during the game jam Climate Jam 2022 organized by IndieCade, from the 22nd of April to the 1st of May 2022. 

Designed, developed and produced by Louis Dublois. Original score produced by Louis Dublois.
